name: Love of Dragons
description:
Dragons once roamed the skies. Now they are only old tales.

Visual/Kinetic Novel about love, sacrifice, family, and loneliness with a bit different approach to the concept of dragons.

In this story you will:

  • live with three half-dragon girls
  • meet with the Queen-Empress
  • get thrown in a jail
  • hope you won't get killed

The game has about 2 hours of content (Depends on your reading speed).
